USER: [{'tool_use_id': 'toolu_017MLQrKz2ynmRYTijioo5Ko', 'type': 'tool_result', 'content': 'The file /mnt/WolfPack/A_Letter_to_my_son/CLAUDE.md has been updated. Here's the result of running `cat -n` on a snippet of the edited file:
    20→PGPASSWORD=wolflogic2024 psql -h 100.110.82.181 -p 5433 -U wolf -d wolf_logic -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM memories; SELECT COUNT(*) FROM memories_embedding; SELECT vector_dims(embedding) FROM memories_embedding LIMIT 1;"
    21→```
    22→**Expected:** 97,000+ memories, 400,000+ vectorized, 2560 dimensions
    23→
    24→### Step 3: Git Sync Protocol
    25→```bash
    26→# Check which node we're on
    27→NODE_IP=$(hostname -I | grep -oE '100\.110\.82\.(181|245|250)' | head -n1)
    28→
    29→cd /mnt/Wolf-code/Wolf-Ai-Enterptises/Wolf-Logic-MCP
    30→
    31→# All nodes can push and pull bidirectionally
    32→git pull gitlab main && git push gitlab main
    33→echo "Node $NODE_IP - synced with GitLab (pull + push)"
    34→```
    35→
    36→**GitLab Remote Configuration:**
    37→- **URL:** `ssh://git@100.110.82.250:8022/thewolf/Wolf-Logic-MCP.git`
    38→- **Access:** Via Tailscale mesh'}]
